item-by-Betsy.name: Betsy Ramser Jaime
item-by-Betsy.text: “We often overestimate how often we do things, but tracking eliminates this weakness. When we track we just have the facts, not our subjective reflections.”

item-by-Hippocrates.name: Hippocrates
item-by-Hippocrates.text: “If we could give every individual the right amount of nourishment and exercise, not too little and not too much, we would have found the safest way to health.”

item-by-Jam.name: Criss Jam
item-by-Jam.text: “If you want to find the real competition, just look in the mirror. After awhile you'll see your rivals scrambling for second place.”
